title: Ever since the ANDROID 11 UPDATE, I HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO USE THE STARMAKER KARAOKE APP FOR SINGING.
content: I've uninstalled the Starmaker app and installed it again, cleared the caches, and still having issues when trying to sing dice the ANDROID 11 UPDATE! VERY FRUSTRATING. AND YES I'VE CREATED THE PERMISSIONS IN THE SETTINGS FOR CAMERA AND M I C
